TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

MemberSignature.Value: public GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs (System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition contentPosition, int pageNumber, Exception error, bool cancelled, object userState);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition contentPosition, int32 pageNumber, class System.Exception error, bool cancelled, object userState) cil managed

Docs.param: The page number where the appears.
The exception that occurred during the asynchronous operation; or NULL if there were no errors.
`true` if the asynchronous operation was canceled; otherwise, `false`.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs"> class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The asynchronous operation can be canceled by calling <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.CancelAsync%2A>.
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs.PageNumber%2A> property identifies the page number of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition>.

Docs.summary: Gets the page number for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"> passed to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A>.
Docs.value: The page number (zero-based) for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"> passed to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition> property contains the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition> passed to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A>.
